title: Introduction to Programming
text: CS 101 introduces variables, control flow, and functions in Python. No prerequisites. 4 credits.

title: Data Structures
text: CS 201 covers arrays, linked lists, trees, and hash tables. Prerequisite: CS 101. 4 credits.

title: Algorithms
text: CS 301 introduces asymptotic analysis, graph algorithms, and dynamic programming. Prerequisites: CS 201 and MATH 210. 4 credits.

title: Discrete Mathematics
text: MATH 210 covers logic, proofs, combinatorics, and graph theory. No prerequisites. 3 credits.

title: Professional Communication
text: BUS 115 focuses on professional writing, presentations, and teamwork communication. No prerequisites. 3 credits.
